files.content: "use client"; import React from "react"; import { Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionTrigger, AccordionContent, } from "@/components/craftui/ui/accordion"; import { Plus } from "lucide-react"; export default function AccordionCustomIcons() { return ( What is React? React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It lets you create reusable UI components. What is Tailwind CSS? Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework packed with classes like flex, pt-4, text-center and rotate-90 that can be composed to build any design, directly in your markup. Why use Framer Motion? Framer Motion is a motion library for React. It provides a declarative, flexible API to add smooth animations and gestures to your components. ); }
